body:
## What happened

Android Studio installs the Flutter throw null pointer

## Version information

Android Studio `4.1 Canary 10` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 46.0.4` • Dart plugin `201.7223.99`

No Flutter sdk configured.

## Exception

null

```
com.intellij.diagnostic.PluginException: io.flutter.FlutterStudioInitializer PluginClassLoader[io.flutter, 46.0.4] com.intellij.ide.plugins.cl.PluginClassLoader@3bb57c94 [Plugin: io.flutter]
```

comment_data.body:
Known issue. If you want to use the Flutter plugin in canary 10 you need to switch to the dev channel.
https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/wiki/Dev-Channel

title: Android Studio  install  Flutter plugin  NullPointException
